content: At this point, if you've collected the Loong Scales back in Chapter 2, a familiar voice will begin to speak, indicating that a secret Loong boss is not far away. Follow the voice past a large area littered with the remains of wooden treasure chests to find the local Shrine, and up ahead at the top of the cliffside path you can find what appears to be the Ancient Master standing under a pavilion.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Relief of the Fallen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
At this point, if you've collected the Loong Scales back in Chapter 2, a familiar voice will begin to speak, indicating that a secret Loong boss is not far away. Follow the voice past a large area littered with the remains of wooden treasure chests to find the local Shrine, and up ahead at the top of the cliffside path you can find what appears to be the Ancient Master standing under a pavilion.
